definitions.definition: A recondite ( hidden or obscure ) person or thing.
A scholar or other person who is recondite, that is, who has mastery over his or her field , including its esoteric minutiae .

main_definition: ( rare ) A recondite ( hidden or obscure ) person or thing.
secondary_definitions: ( rare ) A scholar or other person who is recondite, that is, who has mastery over his or her field , including its esoteric minutiae .
